walkthrough.badBaseURL:
It seems that the host address in the configuration is wrong.
Re-enter the host again or go to Settings->autokitteh and set the BaseURL in the following format: http://URL:PORT

It seems that the host address in the configuration is wrong.
Go to Settings->autokitteh and set the BaseURL in the following format: http://URL:PORT
